title: SAGA OF BLUEEYES WHITE DRAGON STRUCTURE DECK

card.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
card.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

card.name: Rabidragon
card.description: It's a snowfield-dwelling, giant-ear-sporting, super-acoustic, snowball-shaped mutant dragon! There's no way anybody can escape.

card.name: Alexandrite Dragon
card.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

card.name: Luster Dragon
card.description: A very beautiful dragon covered with sapphire. It does not like fights, but has incredibly high attack power.

card.name: Flamvell Guard
card.description: A Flamvell guardian who commands fire with his will. His magma-hot barrier protects his troops from intruders.

card.name: Maiden with Eyes of Blue
card.description: When a card or effect is activated that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or GY. When this card is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack, and if you do, change the battle position of this card, then you can Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use 1 "Maiden with Eyes of Blue" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

card.name: Rider of the Storm Winds
card.description: You can target 1 Dragon Normal Monster you control; equip this monster from your hand or field to that target. If a monster equipped with this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If a monster equipped with this card would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.

card.name: Darkstorm Dragon
card.description: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.‚óèOnce per turn: You can send 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card you control to the Graveyard; destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

card.name: Kaiser Glider
card.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has the same ATK. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 monster on the field; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Hieratic Dragon of Tefnuit
card.description: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). This card cannot attack during the turn it is Special Summoned this way. When this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, but make its ATK/DEF 0.

card.name: Mirage Dragon
card.description: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

card.name: Divine Dragon Apocralyph
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Dragon-Type monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: The White Stone of Legend
card.description: If this card is sent to the GY: Add 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Kaibaman
card.description: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand.

card.name: Herald of Creation
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 7 or higher monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Kaiser Sea Horse
card.description: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a LIGHT monster.

card.name: Honest
card.description: During your Main Phase: You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand. During the Damage Step, when a LIGHT monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; that monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, until the end of this turn.

card.name: Shining Angel
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Dragon Shrine
card.description: Send 1 Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY, then, if that monster in your GY is a Dragon Normal Monster, you can send 1 more Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Dragon Shrine" per turn.

card.name: Silver's Cry
card.description: Target 1 Dragon Normal Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. You can only activate 1 "Silver's Cry" per turn.

card.name: Burst Stream of Destruction
card.description: If you control "Blue-Eyes White Dragon": Destroy all monsters your opponent controls. "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" you control cannot attack the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Stamping Destruction
card.description: If you control a Dragon monster: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to its controller.

card.name: A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon
card.description: Return 1 Level 5 or higher Dragon-Type monster you control to the hand, and if you do, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

card.name: Trade-In
card.description: Discard 1 Level 8 monster; draw 2 cards.

card.name: Cards of Consonance
card.description: Discard 1 Dragon Tuner with 1000 or less ATK; draw 2 cards.

card.name: White Elephant's Gift
card.description: Send 1 face-up non-Effect Monster you control to the GY; draw 2 cards.

card.name: One for One
card.description: Send 1 monster from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 Level 1 monster from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Monster Reborn
card.description: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

card.name: Dragonic Tactics
card.description: Tribute 2 Dragon monsters; Special Summon 1 Level 8 Dragon monster from your Deck.

card.name: Soul Exchange
card.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, if you Tribute a monster, you must Tribute that target, as if you controlled it. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Swords of Revealing Light
card.description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but you must destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

card.name: Enemy Controller
card.description: Activate 1 of these effects.‚óèTarget 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.‚óèTribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

card.name: Castle of Dragon Souls
card.description: Once per turn: You can banish 1 Dragon monster from your GY, then target 1 monster you control; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). When this face-up card on the field is sent to the GY: You can target 1 of your banished Dragon monsters; Special Summon that target. You can only control 1 "Castle of Dragon Souls".

card.name: Fiendish Chain
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 Effect Monster on the field; negate the effects of that face-up monster while it is on the field, also that face-up monster cannot attack. When it is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Kunai with Chain
card.description: Activate 1 or both of these effects (simultaneously).‚óèWhen an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; change that target to Defense Position.‚óèTarget 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK.

card.name: Damage Condenser
card.description: When you take battle damage: Discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with ATK less than or equal to the battle damage you took, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Call of the Haunted
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Compulsory Evacuation Device
card.description: Target 1 monster on the field; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Champion's Vigilance
card.description: If you control a Level 7 or higher Normal Monster, when a monster would be Summoned OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

card.name: Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon
card.description: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Normal MonstersIf this card is Special Summoned: Until the end of the next turn, neither player can target Dragon monsters you currently control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by card effects. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can target 1 Normal Monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
